splash.title: How DiversiTea Works
splash.text: Each month DiversiTea selects two different teas, pack them into our environmental friendly package and deliver them directly to your doorstep.

intro: Let us understand your taste first then sit back and relax
title: Find the perfect tea you love

block.heading: Exquisite taste
block.paragraph: Enjoy the finest quality loose leaf teas, freshly sourced from the best tea experts in the UK

block.heading: Seasonality
block.paragraph: Glow your tea musings by focusing on different aspects of nature and the changing seasons in the box

block.heading: Bio-degradable
block.paragraph: As much as we think of tea, we think of the environmental sustainability of our product

dictionary.heading: Tea Quiz: Your personal guide to the world of tea
dictionary.paragraph: There's an infinite array of teas out there. Start exploring with our short Tea Quiz, which finds the tea that will be beautiful to you. Get custom tea recommendations based on your particular flavour preferences.

quiz.heading: Tea Dictionary: Peruse the infinite array of teas
quiz.paragraph: This is for the ones who want to try DiversiTea or to make a gift to your beloved ones. From Chocolate cake tea to finest FTGFOP1 graded black tea, we collected diverse teas of unparalleled quality. Simply browse, pick and brew!

testimonial.quote: It was incredible. Shockingly so and I am still coming down from it...
testimonial.author: Emma Peel

testimonial.quote: Absolutely stunning service & really lovely tea
testimonial.author: Lesley Pyne

testimonial.quote: Always easy to deal with and the tea is so good
testimonial.author: Debbie Harkness
